long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stores hosted on Ouedkniss (for example: https://www.ouedkniss.com/store/5975/pc-pro-dz) shows all the products listed on the store without the ability to filter them. It can be really hard to find products with a price that does not exceeds your budget.
BudgetKniss gives you the ability to set a budget, and all the products that you can buy with that budget will be highlighted. You can also hide products with a price higher than your budget, and the products that are not listed with a price (sold or unavailable).
